documentation.description: Execute a query using JQL(JIRA Query Language) and return the result. Configure template(org.wso2.carbon.jira.configure) must be called before calling this template.

description.span: object which contains the result for the query.

documentation.sample: <call-template target="org.wso2.carbon.jira.configure"> <with-param name="jira.uri" value="http://myjira.com:8080/jira/"/> <with-param name="jira.username" value="admin"/> <with-param name="jira.password" value="admin"/> </call-template> <call-template target="org.wso2.carbon.jira.searchJira"> <with-param name="jira.jqlQuery" value="assignee was lasantha"/> </call-template>

parameter.name: jira.jqlQuery
parameter.description: the search query to be executed as a String
